intro: Matalbatzia oligantha, commonly known as the desert nightshade, is a flowering plant native to arid regions of North America. It is a perennial shrub that typically grows in rocky soils and dry landscapes. The plant produces small, bell-shaped flowers that are usually white or pale purple, blooming at night. Its fruit is a fleshy, edible berry that contains several seeds. Matalbatzia oligantha is adapted to withstand extreme heat and drought, making it a resilient species in harsh environments.
